backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining the BharatSMM backend with services, orders, balances, and user profiles, including seeded service data and mixins for storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features — `useAddBalanceToUser` hook and Admin Dashboard 'Add Balance' section — to their respective files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of short summaries for every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the project's frontend structure.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH CSS custom properties for light and dark themes used throughout the BharatSMM UI.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with BharatSMM title, meta/Open Graph/Twitter Card tags, favicon, and dark mode class.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app wiring TanStack Router, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, all page routes, auth gating, and the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Persistent sidebar layout component with navigation links, conditional admin link, sign-out handler, and a caffeine.ai footer.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Small badge component that maps each order status enum value to a color-coded pill with a human-readable label.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects a user's name and email to set up their BharatSMM profile, using the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation and displaying toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, and invalidates all dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` context and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage Internet Identity authentication via `AuthClient`, exposing login/logout functions and login status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for all backend interactions including user profile, services, orders, balance, and top-up operations, each wired to the ICP actor from `useActor`.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that configures Tailwind, imports Google Fonts (Space Grotesk and Inter), and defines CSS custom properties for a dark navy/charcoal theme with brand orange accent colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/pages/AddFunds.tsx: A page that allows users to top up their BharatSMM wallet by entering an amount and paying via UPI, displaying a QR code, preset amount buttons, current balance, and submitting a top-up request via the `useInitiateTopUp` mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page with tabs for managing service prices, updating order statuses, and adding balance to users, with access control enforced via useIsAdmin hook.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard page displaying account stats (balance, total/in-progress/completed orders) and a recent orders table with links to other sections.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Public login page showcasing BharatSMM features and a login button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NewOrder.tsx: Order placement page where users select a service category and specific service, enter a link and quantity, and submit an order with real-time cost calculation and balance validation.
frontend/src/pages/Orders.tsx: Paginated orders list page with search filtering by service name, link, or order ID, displaying order details and status badges in a table.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: React page for viewing and editing the logged-in user's profile (name, email), with principal ID display and copy functionality using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: React page that lists all available social media marketing services with search and category filter, grouped by platform category with color-coded badges.
frontend/src/utils/orderCalculations.ts: Utility functions for calculating order totals from price-per-1000 and quantity, and formatting amounts as INR currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors (brand, navy scale, semantic tokens), fonts (Inter, Space Grotesk, JetBrains Mono), border radii, shadows, and animations for the BharatSMM dark theme.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 15) describing the BharatSMM SMM panel app's existing features, architectural notes, and build requirements including frontend pages and admin dashboard functionality.
